info.title: FlawMind API Documentation
info.description: API documentation for FlawMind ERP system

post.description: Create a new user account and return access token
Authenticate user and return access token

403.description: Account not allowed to login or inactive

get.description: Get the currently authenticated user details

post.description: Revoke the current access token
Revoke all access tokens for the authenticated user

200.description: Successfully logged out from all devices

message.example: Successfully logged out from all devices

post.description: Revoke current token and generate a new one

get.description: Get paginated list of brands for the business

post.description: Create a new product brand

get.description: Get details of a specific brand
Get paginated list of main product categories with their sub-categories

post.description: Create a product category or sub-category. Set parent_id=0 or omit for a main category.

parent_id.description: 0 = main category, else sub-category of that parent

get.description: Get details of a specific category with its sub-categories
Get paginated list of products with optional filters

post.description: Create a new product (single, variable, modifier, or combo)

get.description: Get full details of a product including variations, stock, and price groups

put.description: Update an existing product's core fields

delete.description: Soft-delete a product and its variations

get.description: Get stock quantities per location for all variations of a product
Get all variations for a specific product
Get all price group overrides for a product

post.description: Save or update price group prices for a product's variations
Deactivate multiple products at once
Delete multiple products at once
Check whether a SKU is available within the business

product_id.description: Exclude this product ID when editing

get.description: Get paginated list of selling price groups for the business

post.description: Create a new customer price tier (e.g. Wholesale, VIP)

get.description: Get details of a specific selling price group

put.description: Update an existing selling price group

patch.description: Toggle the active/inactive state of a selling price group

get.description: Get paginated list of units of measurement

post.description: Create a new unit of measurement. Optionally link to a base unit for sub-unit conversion.

get.description: Get details of a specific unit including sub-units

put.description: Update an existing unit of measurement

get.description: Get paginated list of variation templates with their values

post.description: Create a new reusable variation template with values

get.description: Get a specific variation template with all its values

put.description: Update a variation template and sync its values

delete.description: Delete a variation template and all its values

post.description: Add a new value to an existing variation template

delete.description: Delete a specific value from a variation template

get.description: Get paginated list of warranties for the business

post.description: Create a new warranty definition

get.description: Get details of a specific warranty
Get paginated list of contacts

post.description: Create a new customer or supplier

get.description: Get details of a specific contact
Get all transactions for a contact
Get available contact types
Get all payments for a specific transaction

post.description: Add a new payment to a transaction

get.description: Get details of a specific payment

post.description: Pay outstanding dues for a contact

get.description: Get total due amount for a contact
Get available payment methods
Get paginated list of all sales transactions

post.description: Create a new sales transaction

get.description: Get details of a specific sale
Get list of draft sales
Get list of quotations

post.description: Convert a draft or quotation to final invoice

get.description: Get paginated list of all sell returns

post.description: Create a new sell return for a sale

get.description: Get details of a specific sell return
Check if an invoice can be returned

bearerAuth.description: Enter your Bearer token in the format: Bearer {token}
